__e: And to protect her, I've told Niklaus and I'm telling you.
So Klaus is a dick, and you want to be a good big brother. So we can't hang out.
Klaus isn't the only thing we need to be afraid of.
What we're doing is nothing Klaus hasn't done to both you and your brother a dozen times over.
Klaus may not be your blood, Be he certainly has picked up a few things From you along the way.
Klaus destroyed everything good in my life.
Do we know if Klaus has everything he needs to do this? Does he have a werewolf?
Klaus has everything he needs for now.
Klaus might've found us and killed us, but he'll do that, anyway.
Do you know the reason we're together? It's because Klaus granted us permission to be together.
Before all this with Klaus, did you think about it then?
I used to do everything Klaus said. But I don't anymore.
Klaus asked me to see what I can do.
Klaus told me to do it and I said no.
So Klaus gives you 24 hours in the quarter, and you're spending it coffin sitting with me?
Klaus saved you like you saved me.
The truth is, I know you have Klaus' ear, and I need him to trust me.
